name: Adventure Prototype
description:
An early prototype of a peaceful, low-poly adventure game where the player explores various islands using swimming, climbing and platforming mechanics. To be played with an Xbox 360 game pad.

Climbing Controls:

To grab a ledge from standing or from in the water hold both the left and right triggers and move into the ledge. 

Once on the ledge letting go of the left/right trigger will allow you to move the left/right hand.

move the hand over a new part of the ledge or a different ledge and repress the respective trigger to move to the new ledge.

letting go of both triggers at the same time or running out of stamina will cause the player to fall.
